DataMigrationArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that identifies this replication.

DataMigrationCreateTime.description: The UTC time when DMS created the data migration.

CloudwatchLogsEnabled.description: Whether to enable CloudWatch logging for the data migration.

NumberOfJobs.description: The number of parallel jobs that trigger parallel threads to unload the tables from the source, and then load them to the target.

SelectionRules.description: A JSON-formatted string that defines what objects to include and exclude from the migration.

DataMigrationSettings.description: Options for configuring a data migration, including whether to enable CloudWatch logs, and the selection rules to use to include or exclude database objects from the migration.

CDCStartPosition.description: The property is a point in the database engine's log that defines a time where you can begin CDC.

CDCStartTime.description: The property indicates the start time for a change data capture (CDC) operation. The value is server time in UTC format.

CDCStopTime.description: The property indicates the stop time for a change data capture (CDC) operation. The value is server time in UTC format.

SlotName.description: The property sets the name of a previously created logical replication slot for a change data capture (CDC) load of the source instance.

description: This object provides information about a AWS DMS data migration.

DataMigrationIdentifier.description: The property describes an ARN of the data migration.

DataMigrationName.description: The user-friendly name for the data migration.

DataMigrationSettings.description: Specifies CloudWatch settings and selection rules for the data migration.

DataMigrationType.description: Specifies whether the data migration is full-load only, change data capture (CDC) only, or full-load and CDC.

MigrationProjectIdentifier.description: The property describes an identifier for the migration project. It is used for describing/deleting/modifying can be name/arn

ServiceAccessRoleArn.description: The IAM role that the data migration uses to access AWS resources.

SourceDataSettings.description: Specifies information about the data migration's source data provider.

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
